author: m.kalinin
content: There is no uncles mechanism on the beacon chain, though there is one post that mentions uncles and eth2 in the same context (https://ethresear.ch/t/timeliness-detectors-and-51-attack-recovery-in-blockchains/6925) but this mechanism is unlikely to be implemented before the merge. BN is connected to ethereum node currently and this is the mechanism that theoretically could be used to verify PoW blocks. The question is how rewards could be paid in this case. Won't it be easier to airdrop ETH to award those miners?

author: m.kalinin
content: I like the idea of awarding miners trustlessly but it requires implementing a mechanism in the beacon chain to do that. Taking in account that this mechanism would be required for the transition only it might be an overcomplication.
